movieInfo:
Directed by: Jai Ram Kumar
Starring by: Homanand, Pavani, Priyanka Sharma
Genres: Horror, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Homanand is hardworking man. His aim is to fullfill his father dream of buying a house. With lots of efforts he earns enough money and buys a house. Later he comes to know that there is a ghostly creature in the house that wreaks havoc in the house.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sreenu Vaitla
Written by: Gopimohan, Upendra Madhav
Starring by: Mahesh Babu, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Sonu Sood
Genres: Action, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Shankar Narayana is an honest politician who meets with a near-fatal accident. Some years later, Shankarâ€™s son Ajay has grown up to become a police officer. Ajayâ€™s mission to bring down the trade of drugs and weapons, takes him to Istanbul. Itâ€™s while there that he first meets fashion student Prashanthi. Ajay is smitten with her. Back in India, Shankar finally awakes from a long coma. Ajay creates an elaborate home-life charade to shield his still-fragile father from any stress or shock. While out on the streets, it is time to hunt down Don Nayak and his criminal associates who tried to kill his father all those years ago.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Srinivas Avasarala
Starring by: Srinivas Avasarala, Bhadram, Krishna Bhagavan
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: N. Venkateswara Rao a.k.a. Venky (Naga Shourya) works in UB TV and his aspiration is to become a news reader just like his father N. Bhanu Murthy who discontinued his work as a news reader in Doordarshan after entry of new channels and a paralysis attack. However he is unable to reach his target and he has a strong contender for the job of news reader in the form of Vamana Rao (Posani Krishna Murali). Till then, he works for Teleshopping advertisements for nearly 4 years in UB TV. Moreover, his overbearing boss Uday Bhaskar a.k.a. Uday (Srinivas Avasarala) is jealous of Venky as Venky could easily communicate with girls which Uday could never do.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sunil Kumar Reddy
Starring by: Chetan Maddineni, Dimple, Posani Krishna Murali
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siva(Chetan) is a happy go lucky youth who wants to go to the Gulf and earn good money. Even though his parents disapprove of his choice, he somehow reaches Dubai. There, he meets Lakshmi(Dimple Hayati) who is also in Dubai for the same purpose. Sivaâ€™s friendship with Lakshmi transforms into love but they fall in all sorts of problems like any other Indian public who works in Gulf countries.

movieDescription: Two men cheat innocent people of their money to be able to lead a luxurious life but what happens when one of their such plans finds them in the clutches of a ghost?

movieInfo:

movieDescription: Set against the backdrop of 1971 Indo-Pak war, the movie is inspired by real incidents and the protagonists are inspired by Param Vir Chakra recipients. The movie shows what consequences of war are on the lives of soldiers on either side of the border.

movieInfo:

movieDescription: While making a music video, a group of filmmakers accidentally waken the curse of Bloody Mary, a young woman who was brutally murdered over 100 years ago by her jealous husband whoâ€™s distant descendant is the star of the music video. Seductive and mysterious, the redhead ghost of Mary draws the crew people one by one into her web to kill them.

movieDescription: In Mumbai, the people who had migrated from Tamil Nadu are living in the Dharavi slum. Union minister Haridev â€œHari Dhadhaâ€� Abhayankar (Nana Patekar), previously a gangster who had carried out attacks in Dharavi, tries to evict the people and seize their land. Over the years he becomes a minister and plans to clear the area to construct buildings using his construction company in the form of government scheme with the help of his supporter Vishnu Bhai (Sampath Raj).

movieInfo:
Starring by: Amrutha Srinivasan
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Abadham Venuka is a thriller drama on a young urban couple whose arranged marriage goes horribly wrong when the wife accidentally kills her husband. This sets off a chain of events that reveal the true nature of every character involved in this marriage.

movieDescription: Green Card is a Telugu movie starring Satrugna Rayapati and Chalapathi Rao in prominent roles. It is a drama film directed by Rums.

movieInfo:
Starring by: Abijeet Duddala, Moin, Krishna Teja
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Varun and Jaggu return as a married couple on a mission to save Balarajuâ€™s wedding- while there is trouble brewing in their own marriage Varun and Jagadamba are married and have been living together for over a year now in Hyderabad. Like every marriage, their relationship also goes through a lot of ups and downs. Their fights are hilariously cute and give us a sense of a young couple who are in love but due to their ego and misunderstandings start turning small things into a big deal. Slowly distance between them increases and things get serious to the extent that Jagadamba wants to file for a divorce.

movieInfo:

Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddhu (Neeraj Shyam) is a young man who hates women completely. One fine day, a lady named Hasini(Nyra Shah) joins his office as his MD. Siddhuâ€™s problems get even worse with time. One fine day, when Siddhu goes on a tour with his office mates, he gets into an argument with Hasini. An upset Siddhu starts swearing women which is overheard by a Swamiji who in turns curses Siddhu that he will soon fall in love with Hasini.

movieInfo:

movieDescription: Hey Pillagada is a Telugu dub of the Malayalam movie, starring Dulquer Salmaan and Sai Pallavi in the role of a married couple, Siddharth and Anjali. They fall in love during their college days and get married once Siddharth starts working. The movie revolves around their story.
